name: Retribution 1.4.3.1
description:
This is a part of Branching Corpses!

Check out the previous game, Forlorn, HERE!

Check out the first game in the Branching Corpses series, The Legend, HERE!

Check out the source code of THIS game HERE!

Branching corpses is like a tree of videogames. One game in the 'tree' must have at-least two endings, and a game is made off of each of those two endings. There is no goal to my knowledge, other than to just make games!


Endings: (and also big spoilers)

A1: The sword's crystal is destroyed! But something's leaking out of the shards?

A2: The sword was buried far underground in a tomb of traps and puzzles. But something's leaking above-ground?

B1: The once-fisherboy turned angel of death has killed the last remaining member of the hero family tree, leaving the world to crumble beneath his sword and shield of vengance

B2: The fisherboy turned evil by the sword has driven away the last remaining member of the hero family tree, who has went into hiding as a hermit to run from their mistakes.

C: It was a game the whole time, but what's with those strange repairmen and this hard-drive of possibly cosmic origins?

D: After somehow summoning a giant mech made of every item gathered, Stuffatron stomps their mighty feet and utterly decimates the evil blade once and for all. But what to do now that robots are getting into style?

For people looking to make a 'corpse' branching off of this one, you might be asking what the numbers after some endings mean, and why there are multiple?

That's because this is a game of: CHOOSE, YOUR, CANNON!

None of these endings are cannon... yet! If someone makes a game based off of ending A or B, then you get to choose which sub-ending is cannon! Isn't that neat?
